name: mcp-prompt-templates
description: A Model Context Protocol server that provides prompt templates and resource management capabilities
long_description: This Model Context Protocol (MCP) server provides a comprehensive solution for managing and serving prompt templates. It supports dynamic template loading from YAML configurations, argument substitution with Mustache-style placeholders, and resource management for static Markdown content. Perfect for creating reusable prompts for various AI tasks including meeting analysis, content summarization, and custom workflows.

prompts.name: weather_forecast
prompts.description: Generate weather forecast for a specific city and date
prompts.text: Generate a detailed weather forecast for ${arguments.city} on ${arguments.date}
